name: Marvel Trading Card Game
summary: Marvel Trading Card Game features Marvel's complete roster of characters. Utilizing the popular Vs. System Trading Card Game from Upper Deck Entertainment, players can learn the basics of the game as a super hero or super villain in the game's single player campaign mode.
info:
• 平台: PSP
  • 游戏类型: TCG
  • 发行日期: 2007-02-27
  • 官方网站: http://www.konami.com/Konami/ctl3810/cp20113/si2115969/cl1/marvel_trading_card_game
  • 开发: Konami
  • 游戏出版商: Konami
